content: in loving memory of my sister diane i made my square with scheepjes cahlista aran in lemonade with a 4 5mm hook and my finished square measured approximately 6 inches you can use any yarn weight you like just use the hook size recommended on the yarn ball band > this pattern is available free over on my blog 1 1 https //lullabylodge blogspot com/2019/09/the-diane-rachael-granny-square html
